mapper.sql: t.dzid dzid, t.sjdzid sjdzid, t.dzlx dzlx, t.dzbm dzbm, t.dzmc dzmc, t.dzjc dzjc, t.dzdz dzdz, t.bd_lon bdLon, t.bd_lat bdLat, t.xzqh xzqh, t.lxr lxr, t.lxdh lxdh, t.czhm czhm, t.sxdsl sxdsl, t.xygbrs xygbrs, t.zfzzxfys zfzzxfys, t.zfwys zfwys, t.xygbsl xygbsl, t.wzgysl wzgysl, t.zqrs zqrs, t.zdymc zdymc, t.zdydh zdydh, t.dzcm dzcm, t.dzdh dzdh, t.zqcl zqcl, t.mhjl mhjl, t.sysl sysl, t.zddwsl zddwsl, t.xqmj xqmj, t.xqfw xqfw, t.sfdljj sfdljj, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name dzlxmc FROM YAGL_XFDZ t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'DZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.DZLX = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , tcode1.code_name xzqhmc FROM YAGL_XFDZ t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL tcode1 ON (t.xzqh = tcode1.code_value AND tcode1.codeid='61CFA4E7B188490A873395B4FB237C84') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.DZID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,bd_lon,bd_lat,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,czhm,sxdsl,xygbrs,zfzzxfys,zfwys,xygbsl,wzgysl,zqrs,zdymc,zdydh,dzcm,dzdh,zqcl,mhjl,sysl,zddwsl,xqmj,xqfw,sfdljj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bdLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bdLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sxdsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xygbrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zfzzxfys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zfwys,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xygbsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{wzgysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zqrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zdymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzcm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqcl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{mhjl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zddwsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xqmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfdljj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_XFDZ t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.DZID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFDZ(dzid,sjdzid,dzlx,dzbm,dzmc,dzjc,dzdz,bd_lon,bd_lat,xzqh,lxr,lxdh,czhm,sxdsl,xygbrs,zfzzxfys,zfwys,xygbsl,wzgysl,zqrs,zdymc,zdydh,dzcm,dzdh,zqcl,mhjl,sysl,zddwsl,xqmj,xqfw,sfdljj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.dzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzid,#{item.sjdzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sjdzid,#{item.dzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzlx,#{item.dzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzbm,#{item.dzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzmc,#{item.dzjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzjc,#{item.dzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzdz,#{item.bdLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE} bd_lon,#{item.bdLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE} bd_lat,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxr,#{item.lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxdh,#{item.czhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czhm,#{item.sxdsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sxdsl,#{item.xygbrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xygbrs,#{item.zfzzxfys,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zfzzxfys,#{item.zfwys,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zfwys,#{item.xygbsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xygbsl,#{item.wzgysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} wzgysl,#{item.zqrs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zqrs,#{item.zdymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdymc,#{item.zdydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdydh,#{item.dzcm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzcm,#{item.dzdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzdh,#{item.zqcl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zqcl,#{item.mhjl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} mhjl,#{item.sysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sysl,#{item.zddwsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zddwsl,#{item.xqmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xqmj,#{item.xqfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xqfw,#{item.sfdljj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfdljj,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dzid = VALUES(dzid), sjdzid = VALUES(sjdzid), dzlx = VALUES(dzlx), dzbm = VALUES(dzbm), dzmc = VALUES(dzmc), dzjc = VALUES(dzjc), dzdz = VALUES(dzdz), bd_lon = VALUES(bd_lon), bd_lat = VALUES(bd_lat), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), lxr = VALUES(lxr), lxdh = VALUES(lxdh), czhm = VALUES(czhm), sxdsl = VALUES(sxdsl), xygbrs = VALUES(xygbrs), zfzzxfys = VALUES(zfzzxfys), zfwys = VALUES(zfwys), xygbsl = VALUES(xygbsl), wzgysl = VALUES(wzgysl), zqrs = VALUES(zqrs), zdymc = VALUES(zdymc), zdydh = VALUES(zdydh), dzcm = VALUES(dzcm), dzdh = VALUES(dzdh), zqcl = VALUES(zqcl), mhjl = VALUES(mhjl), sysl = VALUES(sysl), zddwsl = VALUES(zddwsl), xqmj = VALUES(xqmj), xqfw = VALUES(xqfw), sfdljj = VALUES(sfdljj), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFDZ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
